section.name: Roadmap to 1.0
section.p:
Melati is stable and perfectly usable.
The following gives the items which would be nice to have before a 1.0 release.

tr.td: 1st beta release.
Template Neutral Melati, allowing any templating engine to be easily plugged in.
Removal of hacked WebMacro classes.
Support for Velocity.
Prove support for JSDK 2.2 (Tomcat).
Support for MySQL.

Support for McKoiDB.
Support for HSQLDB.
Support for JSDK 2.3.
Removal of all deprecated methods.
Removal of all javadoc errors.

Support for JDK 1.1.4.
Maven site generated.
User Locale setting supported.
All imports reorganised and generated code improved.

Support for BigDecimal data type.
Improved Tomcat support.
Rollback bugfix.
Improved generated javadoc.
Improved Maven website.

Additional support for joins, access filtering.
Upgrade to Velocity.
Handling of Chinese and other encodings.
Move junit tests into src/test, reconfiguration of checkstyle, many javadoc/style changes, allow use of webmacro templates within a jar.
Add support for Oracle, improved support for MS SQL Server.

Separation of Melati from servlets.
Improved support for HSQLDB, Oracle.
Support for MS Access.
Unit test coverage extended to canonical Poem database.
Velocity/WebMacro version of admin system.
Templets used to render everything.
Metadata extensible.

Melati / POEM separation.
Support for Maven 2.
Add default properties file.
Completion of JavaDocs.
All public classes done
Completion of Documentation - Manual, Howto's.
In progess
MDK (Melati Developer's Kit)

Bundled with Jetty and HSQLDB.
ant build script improved.
Support for Eclipse.
Support and use of Maven.
